name: picom-ui-library
description: A lightweight JavaScript and CSS component library with drag-and-drop form builder

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist && cat src/core/*.js src/components/*/*.js src/builder/*.js > dist/picom.js && uglifyjs dist/picom.js -o dist/picom.min.js
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist && cat src/components/*/*.css src/builder/*.css > dist/picom.css
